title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Career Fairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Grad 2016     Career Fairs                Career Fairs Grad 2016                           Career Fair Photos   10 Photos  Collaborating with park partners, Lake Mead hosted career fairs and career presentations at the schools.           Career Fair Surveys   5 Photos  Collaborating with park partners, Lake Mead hosted career fairs and career presentations at the schools.           Business Cards   5 Photos  At a school presentation, students created their own business cards based on their interests and where they wanted to live.                         Downloads:   Career Fair Surveys (Word Doc)
